renewed-contributions.title: Master and Man
renewed-contributions.note: Author is Frederick Faust writing under a pseudonym. CCE renewal record gives author pseudonym for this story as George Owen Baxter; FictionMags gives it as Max Brand. I have not examined the issue to see what name is used there.

renewed-contributions.title: The Whisper of the Wilderness (The Whispering Outlaw)
renewed-contributions.note: Author is Frederick Faust writing under a pseudonym. Title as given in CCE renewal record; FictionMags gives it as 'The Whisperer of the Wilderness'. I have not examined the issue to see what title is used there.
